1107120.name: Ghost Stories - Soundtracks DLC
1107120.description:
The original collection of atmospheric music from 15 tracks, including soundtracks of the game from composer WHALESFLY.

Track List - All Songs are in MP3 Format:

  • WHALESFLY - FREE AGAIN
  • WHALESFLY - GHOST STORIES PART 1
  • WHALESFLY - GHOST STORIES PART 2
  • WHALESFLY - GHOST STORIES TRAILER
  • WHALESFLY - GROAN
  • WHALESFLY - INTRO
  • WHALESFLY - JESS
  • WHALESFLY - MY FAREWELL
  • WHALESFLY - NYCTOPHOBIA
  • WHALESFLY - OPEN THE GATE
  • WHALESFLY - OVERDOSE
  • WHALESFLY - PROSTO
  • WHALESFLY - TALK
  • WHALESFLY - UNIVERSE ERROR
  • WHALESFLY - VESNA
1107120.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
